description:
This is a puzzle game using Sanrio characters.

Solve Picross puzzles to unveil pictures and get cute stickers to decorate your screen with!

Or use them on game backgrounds!

Enjoy Picross with your own background!
name: Sanrio characters Picross
disclaimer:
You may need to upgrade your current SD Card to a compatible SDHC Card or microSDHC Card with enough available space to download this software.
Visit support.nintendo.com for information about storage options. Sold separately.
